articles.title: IT stocks surge up to 6% led by midcap counter Mphasis as TCS Q1 cheers D-Street - The Economic Times
articles.description: Indian IT stocks surged due to TCS's robust June quarter earnings. The Nifty IT index rose 3.7%. Infosys and TCS led gains with Rs 62,613 crore revenue and Rs 12,040 crore net profit. MphasiS had notable intraday gains, while HCL Technologies showed growth. T…
